Package com.mhealthatlas.rating.controller

Class RatingCommandController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.rating.controller.RatingCommandController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/ratings")
public class RatingCommandController
extends java.lang.Object
RatingCommandController is the class containing all API endpoints for mutating rating and questionnaire data.

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RatingCommandController()

  • Method Details

    • postRatings

      @PostMapping("") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> postRatings​(@RequestBody java.util.List<NewRatingDto> ratings, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Submits a new rating score.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP POST request calling /ratings

      Only experts can call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      ratings - the rating data; not null; required request body parameter
      authentication - the authentication object, injected by spring security
      Returns:
      200 OK response, if the rating was updated successfully;
      422 UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY otherwise;

    • postQuestionnaire

      @PostMapping("/questionnaires") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Long> postQuestionnaire​(@RequestBody NewQuestionnaireDto questionnaire)
      Creates a new questionnaire.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP POST request calling /ratings/questionnaires

      Only experts can call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      questionnaire - the questionnaire data; not null; required request body parameter
      Returns:
      200 OK response, if the questionnaire was created successfully;
      422 UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY otherwise;

    • updateQuestionnaireStatus

      @PostMapping("/questionnaires/{id}/is-valid/{flag}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_Content_Manager\', \'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> updateQuestionnaireStatus​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id, @PathVariable java.lang.Boolean flag)
      Updates an existing questionnaire.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP POST request calling /questionnaire/{id}/is-valid/{flag}

      Only experts and content managers can call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      id - the questionnaire id; not null; request path parameter
      flag - the questionnaire status; not null; request path parameter
      Returns:
      200 OK response, if the questionnaire status was updated successfully;
      422 UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY otherwise;

    • deleteQuestionnaire

      @DeleteMapping("/questionnaires/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_Content_Manager\', \'ROLE_Expert\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteQuestionnaire​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes an existing questionnaire.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP DELETE request calling /questionnaire/{id}

      Only experts and content managers can call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      id - the questionnaire id; not null; request path parameter
      Returns:
      200 OK response, if the questionnaire was deleted successfully;
      422 UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY otherwise;
